<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/v1/notifications/{notification_id}/status"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update notification status

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"name":"notification_id","in":"path"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"notification_status":{"type":"string","enum":["read","unread"]}},"required":["notification_status"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
